channel.title: Mw2 Pkz (*Hurry*)
channel.description:
Hello guys, first I'm going to start off with proof of a Mod allowing me to post this:::::
[IMG]http://i816.photobucket.com/albums/zz81/xxpl0xrangexx/prooftopost.jpg[/img]
There you go:)
Now I'm here to start a development team because i obviously miss classic runescape pking, also if you're post contains bad language is off-topic or is just u biotching about this then simply do not post, thenagain if you are here to actually join my team follow these simple rules::
Name: (Real Life & In-game) ALBAU:(stands for a little bit about u) Java/CodingExp: (In years/months) WUWTJ: (Why u want this job.) Job: (Which job u want) Msn: (so i can contact u to let u know if you're in.)
Also I just havn't found the right base to use yet, so if you have any in mind u think would be a good, stable, yet classy rsps base. Get me a link:) thanks. Also i prefer the base already have most basic items coded such as godsword obby maul rune c'bow more. Thanks.
Oh yeah! Spots Open::: Server/Coder: Me - Open - Client: (nvm i already have a descent 317 ip changer my friend made:)) Website/Forums for the server: - Open - (first person i pick gets to choose if they want to workwith some1 else on forums.)
Also my ingame name is either gonna be :: (DezNutz,Anarchy,RockinPure,Pl0xRange,Landon)

item.title: Mw2 Pkz (*Hurry*)
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

Sorry. I am already accepted into another Devolopment Team.

I will be a beta-tester if you need me. If i want to come back will you give me the position back?

Read full topic

item.description:
@pl0x15 wrote:

[quote=“Souls`, post:6, topic:335700”]Name: (Real Life & In-game) Tony/AdudeA
ALBAU:(stands for a little bit about u) I usally get called Forum Admin Guru, or Forum GURU…
Java - Coding: 6years/1month
WUWTJ: (Why u want this job.) I want this job because i like making forums for servers.
Job: (Which job u want) Forum Designer
Msn: (so i can contact u to let u know if you’re in.) leb_greak@hotmail.com[/quote]You’re in. And may become Server coder if u want.
